show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #15 Drew Perrson "Beefchain, crypto and block chained explained by a cattleman."
subtitle: #15 Drew Perrson "Beefchain, crypto and block chained explained by a cattleman."
summary:
Drew Perrson from Beefchain joins us this week for a great conversation about traceability, and how that helps connect the producers with consumers.

www.beefchain.com
